action_points.description: Implement a robust, AI-powered cyber defense system that integrates advanced threat intelligence and automated response mechanisms to counter the rising threat of AI-driven phishing attacks.
Accelerate the patch management cycle and enforce strict compliance checks to address and mitigate vulnerabilities in Microsoft SharePoint and other critical enterprise applications.
Conduct a comprehensive risk assessment focused on AI and technology vulnerabilities, updating our cybersecurity strategy to align with emerging threat patterns.
